entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
